mosinstall.name: AlphaContentBot
mosinstall.author: Bernard Gilly
mosinstall.license: This component is released under DonationWare License. All rights reserved.
mosinstall.description: Provide tree directory for AlphaContent Component, Ajax rating bar and link to Google Maps Location in your content articles.

param.name: excludeID
param.label: Exclude ID content
param.description: Exclude specific content items : not display alphabetical bar, directory and rating bar (to specify more than one article, seperate with a comma , ).
